name: Mood Swing
description:
Overview

Change you mood to give different powers and kill the scientists who want to turn you into a lab rat in this platformer adventure. Made in 1 week for the Mood Change Jam.

Controls:

  • WASD or the arrow keys to move and jump
  • 1, 2, and 3 to change mood
  • Space to use ability
  • ESC to pause the game

Note from developer

During the week that I had to make this game, I learnt a lot in the world of saving and loading games in unity. It's something I'd never touched on before and I enjoyed the learning experience. The story isn't that polished and there's only one level as I had to create both the art and music as well. I plan on developing this game in the future and really enjoyed creating it.
